item.title: About us - IT Security
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1482239915739{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column][volcanno_single_image reveal="true" image="2347"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1482240160166{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column][volcanno_heading title="Leading IT Security Consulting Company" subtitle="COMPANY OVERVIEW"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1482240016836{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}"]ConsultingPress is a leading IT Security consulting company with over 15 years of experience in vulnerability and threat management, IT Security Architecture and implementation, security risk and compliance, security incident management and security education and awareness. ConsultingPress has built its expertise on high-skilled IT Security consulting specialists, each in their own field of IT Security consulting field.
We offer IT Security consulting services in various industry sectors including aerospace and defense, energy and chemicals, transportation and logistics, communications, banking and finance and education and non-profit industry sector.
Here in ConsultingPress we offer our clients wide range of IT Security consulting services including risk management, attack and penetration testing, cyber threat intelligence, cyber defense development and incident and response recovery. We help you understand value of IT Security and benefits you have implementing best IT security practices.[/vc_column_text][volcanno_feature_box style="feature-box" title="Our mission" text="Helping local businesses create efficient, successful and sustainable tourism business by destination assessment, development, management and marketing."][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column item.title: Company History
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1482241000782{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column][volcanno_single_image reveal="true" image="2351"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading title="Company history" subtitle="About"][vc_column_text]
ConsultingPress is 15 years in IT Security consulting business, started by two enthusiasts it grew to team of 20 high-skilled IT Security consulting specialists. Here is how we started.
[/vc_column_text][volcanno_company_timeline param_group="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_fontawesome%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-calendar%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-boat%22%2C%22title%22%3A%222001.%20Building%20the%20foundations%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22ConsultingPress%20is%2015%20years%20in%20IT%20Security%20consulting%20business%2C%20started%20by%20two%20enthusiasts%20it%20grew%20to%20team%20of%2020%20high-skilled%20IT%20Security%20consulting%20specialists.%20Here%20is%20how%20we%20started.%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_fontawesome%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-calendar%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-boat%22%2C%22title%22%3A%222003.%20First%20expansion%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22In%202003.%20ConsultingPress%20expanded%20their%20team%20with%20four%20IT%20Security%20consulting%20experts.%20As%20there%20were%20more%20and%20more%20complex%20projects%20we%20needed%20right%20people%20to%20do%20the%20job.%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_fontawesome%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-calendar%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-boat%22%2C%22title%22%3A%222008.%20Global%20coverage%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22In%202008.%20we%20opened%20ten%20new%20offices%20on%20three%20continents%20expanding%20our%20partnership%20and%20team%20network%20of%20IT%20Security%20consulting%20specialists%20with%20wide%20range%20of%20experience%20in%20various%20industry%20sectors.%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_fontawesome%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-calendar%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-boat%22%2C%22title%22%3A%222016.%20Leading%20IT%20Security%20consulting%20company%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22ConsultingPress%20become%20awarded%20international%20consulting%20company%20and%20a%20leader%20in%20it%E2%80%99s%20field.%20We%20developed%20into%20powerful%20company%20based%20upon%20best%20IT%20Security%20consulting%20specialists%20and%20powerful%20global%20connections%20and%20partnerships.%5Cn%22%7D%5D" design_param=".vc_custom_1482406175453{margin-top: 80px !important;}"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Careers
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_nivo_slider slide_group="%5B%7B%22image%22%3A%22586%22%2C%22caption%22%3A%22I%20am%20very%20enthusiastic%20about%20my%20work%2C%20mainly%20because%20I%20work%20in%20creative%20and%20positive%20environment%20with%20some%20amazing%20people.%22%2C%22subtext%22%3A%22Ashley%20Valdez%2C%20Online%20Marketing%22%2C%22subtext_color%22%3A%22%230bb4ce%22%7D%2C%7B%22image%22%3A%22588%22%2C%22caption%22%3A%22I've%20learned%20a%20lot%20in%20these%20few%20years%20in%20ConsultingPress.%20Among%20all%2C%20the%20importance%20of%20good%20IT%20Security.%22%2C%22subtext%22%3A%22Patrick%20Murray%2C%20Principal%22%2C%22subtext_color%22%3A%22%230bb4ce%22%7D%2C%7B%22image%22%3A%22587%22%2C%22caption%22%3A%22Working%20in%20ConsultingPress%20is%20great.%20It's%20all%20about%20team%20effort.%22%2C%22subtext%22%3A%22Brandon%20Lucas%2C%20Marketing%20Specialist%22%2C%22subtext_color%22%3A%22%230bb4ce%22%7D%5D" width="750" height="396" title_size="nivo-slider-01" design_param=".vc_custom_1482484013282{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}"][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Work for ConsultingPress"][vc_column_text]Here at ConsultingPress, we are always looking for fresh talents. ConsultingPress is a leading IT Security consulting company with offices around the world. Our team is comprised of high-skilled IT Security consultants including vulnerability and risk management, security implementation and architecture and security education and awareness training. If you have passion for all things IT Security consulting related you might be the perfect person for us. We work with interns, volunteers and consultants around the world, so no matter where you are from, we might have a job opportunity just for you.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1482242802279{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_video link="https://vimeo.com/144656411?color=ff5500"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Who are we looking for" title_size="h3"][vc_column_text]We always look for creative and enthusiastic people to join our team. You simply must be passionate about your job and everything else will come along. You can check available job positions, or open an open letter. We are looking forward to meeting you![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1482243092508{margin-bottom: 120px !important;}"][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Opened job positions" title_size="h3" design_param=".vc_custom_1482242347900{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}"][volcanno_table design_param=".vc_custom_1484832003481{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"]

item.title: Our team
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_team_member href="url:http%3A%2F%2Fdemo.pixel-industry.com%2Fconsultingpress%2Fhome-it-security%2Four-team%2Fteam-member-page%2F|||" image="559" title="CEO & FOUNDER" name="Joshua Turner" bio=""]Joshua is CEO and founder of ConsultingPress.
Joshua has been in consulting business for over 20 years. After working in large IT Security agency for five years, Joshua recognized the need for IT Security consultants and decided to grow his experience in that direction.[/volcanno_team_member][volcanno_team_member href="url:http%3A%2F%2Fdemo.pixel-industry.com%2Fconsultingpress%2Fhome-it-security%2Four-team%2Fteam-member-page-patrick%2F|||" image="565" title="PRINCIPAL" name="Patrick Murray" bio=""]Patrick has 15 years of experience in IT Security consulting with major expertise in vulnerability management. Prior to becoming a principal in ConsultingPress, Patrick worked in Avia IT Security Ltd governing risk management department. Patrick joined ConsultingPress in 2004.[/volcanno_team_member][volcanno_team_member href="url:http%3A%2F%2Fdemo.pixel-industry.com%2Fconsultingpress%2Fhome-it-security%2Four-team%2Fteam-member-page-ashley%2F|||" image="1065" title="IT SECURITY CONSULTANT" name="Ashley Valdez" bio=""]Ashley Valdez is IT Security specialist with expertise in penetration testing and risk management. Ashley has 10 years of experience in IT Security consulting. Ashley joined ConsultingPress in 2009. and since then has been working on security risk and compliance, security incident management and security architecture and implementation.[/volcanno_team_member][volcanno_team_member href="url:http%3A%2F%2Fdemo.pixel-industry.com%2Fconsultingpress%2Fhome-it-security%2Four-team%2Fteam-member-brandon-lucas%2F|||" image="1069" title="SECURITY INCIDENT MANAGEMENT" name="Brandon Lucas" bio=""]Brandon Lucas is specialist security incident management. Brandon joined ConsultingPress in 2005. and since then has been working with clients from three different continents. He is IT Security consulting specialist with wide experience in security incident management.[/volcanno_team_member][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: FAQ
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Frequently Asked Questions" title_size="h3"][vc_column_text]Here a re a list of some frequently asked questions by our clients. if you dont find the answer you seek, please feel free to contact us.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_tta_accordion style="consulting-press-boxed" color="#e21f2f" active_section="1"][vc_tta_section title="What do you do in ConsultingPress?" tab_id="1479380572185-7af5bf78-e0b7"][vc_column_text]ConsultingPress is a leading IT Security consulting company with over 15 years of experience in vulnerability and threat management, IT Security Architecture and implementation, security risk and compliance, security incident management and security education and awareness. ConsultingPress has built its expertise on high-skilled IT Security consulting specialists, each in their own field of IT Security consulting field. We offer IT Security consulting services in various industry sectors including aerospace and defense, energy and chemicals, transportation and logistics, communications, banking and finance and education and non-profit industry sector.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Why IT Security consulting? " tab_id="1479380572204-6e0cbeb5-490f"][vc_column_text]IT Security is of extreme importance for any company, not just IT related companies. Why is that? Investing in IT security and it's proper architecture and implementation company can reduce business risks, threats and negative effects on business processes it might have.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Which IT Security consulting services you provide? " tab_id="1479380659146-4e0c8786-3c2c"][vc_column_text]We provide professional IT Security consulting services including vulnerability and threat management, security architecture and implementation, security risk and compliance, security incident management and security education and awareness training.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="How can I join ConsultingPress Team? " tab_id="1480073062948-598a9de0-4e24"][vc_column_text]You are IT Security expert or want to become one of them? Then please submit your CV and cover letter through job application for on our careers page as we are always looking for fresh talent to join our team.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="What are benefits of IT Security? " tab_id="1480073128886-e040c4f5-fdef"][vc_column_text]IT Security, if implemented and managed properly in first place can reduce companies costs. It helps companies address their most valuable and critical assets and the threats threatening to those assets. Doing so, company can point it's resources to securing it's most valuable assets while reducing overall costs of IT Security.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="What is Vulnerability and Threat Management? " tab_id="1480073178444-b7d6e6c6-b6ed"][vc_column_text]
This is process that includes services like penetration testing and software security.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="What is Security Incident Management? " tab_id="1480073219063-003de716-a915"][vc_column_text]Security Incident Management is one part of our IT Security Consultancy services where ConsultingPress provides detailed procedures for dealing and mitigating security incidents[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="What should I choose ConsultingPress It Security? " tab_id="1480073245648-cfad80ed-e87d"][vc_column_text]There are couple of good reasons to invest in It Security with COnsultingPress, including improved security and reduces costs, reduced potential threat impact on your business, increased efficiency and improved compliance.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_accordion][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Events

item.title: Typography
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1483000811368{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

h1 Heading

This is example of standard h2 heading. The best practice for SEO purposes is to have one h1 heading on your page. For example you can use it on your page title, like we did in this template.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1483000816666{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

h2 Heading

This is example of standard h2 heading. It is used for all major headings on your page. For example the page name is Services. This will be h1 heading. After that you have specific service called "Consulting". This will be h2 heading.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1483000821578{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

h3 Heading

This is example of h3 heading. According to our previous heading standard, on services page you have main service called "Consulting". Then of course you have different fields of consulting, like "Tourism Consulting". That will be heading h3.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1483000830057{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

h4 Heading

This is example of standard h4 heading. It is used for less important headlines. The basic rule is to follow hierarchy. So for example you have service "Tourism Consulting", like we mentioned previously. If you have different services for that main service and you are showing them on that same page, the heading of that services should be h4.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1483000834726{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text]
h5 Heading
This is example of standard h5 heading. It is used for some small elements on the page, less important elements. Where you will use it will depend on structure of your page and how many main sections and subsections you have.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]
h6 Heading
This is example of standard h6 heading. It is used for some small elements on the page, less important elements. Where you will use it will depend on structure of your page and how many main sections and subsections you have.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_divider divider_style="divider"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading title="Custom heading style 01" subtitle="CUSTOM HEADINGS"][vc_column_text]This is example of custom heading style 01. It has small title on the top and main title on the bottom. Perfect for showcasing small amount of content. It is left aligned and fits perfectly on any page.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-02" title="Center aligned custom heading" subtitle="CUSTOM HEADINGS"][vc_column_text]This is example of custom heading style 02. It is center aligned, title is in focus on first place, and you also have subtitle where you can describe what that section is about. It can be only two words, or maybe two sentences.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Custom heading style 03"][vc_column_text]This is example of custom heading style 02. It is center aligned, title is in focus on first place, and you also have subtitle where you can describe what that section is about. It can be only two words, or maybe two sentences.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_divider divider_style="divider"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Blockquote

This is example of a blockquote. You can use it for your company mission and vision statement or on a page showcasing some authors quote.[/vc_column_text][volcanno_blockquote author="- ColorByt"]"I always love when you upload something new. Your attention to detail, uniqueness and story driven design is a joy to explore. Every pixel is there for a reason, nothing is generic, and it all works great together. Truly an inspiration to look p to, and steal from."[/volcanno_blockquote][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_divider divider_style="divider"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Text element

This is simple p tag. Here we will show you different styling for text element you can use. For example this is bold text. There is sometimes a need to color the text. We did it in theme colors. This is how it looks.You may have a need to color the background of the text, that is to highlight something important. This is highlighted text.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Code element

This is one of the standard HTML elements.[/vc_column_text][volcanno_raw_code code="alF1ZXJ5JTI4ZG9jdW1lbnQlMjkucmVhZHklMjhmdW5jdGlvbiUyMCUyOCUyNCUyOSUyMCU3QiUwQSUyMCUyMCUyMCUyMCUyN3VzZSUyMHN0cmljdCUyNyUzQiUwQSUyMCUyMCUyMCUyMCUyRiUyRiUyMFlvdXIlMjBjb2RlJTIwZ29lcyUyMGhlcmUlMEElN0QlMjklM0IlMjAlMjA="][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Dividers
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1482824941562{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1482824910604{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}"]
Custom dots divider
This is example of custom divider in shape of three dots. It is perfect for dividing your content in a beautiful way. Perfect to use on home and intro pages as it adds some custom, unique feel to your page. It's clean and simple, yet it divides your content in nice way and adds a bit of designers touch to the site. Of course we made some other, simpler dividers you can use on any of your pages. To use a divider, simply add it in a row and full width column inside that row. To use this type of divider just use class "divider".[/vc_column_text][volcanno_divider divider_style="divider"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1482825384714{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1482825393079{margin-bottom: 110px !important;}"]
Simple Line divider
This is example of a simple line divider that divides rows of your content. You can use it on any of your pages, home page or inner pages. To use it, add it in a single row, full width column. Inside of it place a divider element, style line. SImple![/vc_column_text][volcanno_divider divider_style="divider-line"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1482825435126{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1482825404905{margin-bottom: 110px !important;}"]
Divider dotted
This is example of a simple dotted divider that divides rows of your content. You can use it on any of your pages, home page or inner pages. To use it, add it in a single row, full width column. Inside of it place a div with class "divider-dotted".[/vc_column_text][volcanno_divider divider_style="divider-dotted"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1482825445460{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1482825415002{margin-bottom: 110px !important;}"]
Custom icon divider
You can use any of the FontAwesome or Lynny Icons Font icons in this divider. You can use it on any of your pages, home page or inner pages. To use it, add it in a single row, full width column.[/vc_column_text][volcanno_divider divider_style="divider-icon" icon_type="icon_lynny" icon_lynny="lynny-building-2" design_param=".vc_custom_1483001615890{margin-top: 15px !important;}"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1482826288333{margin-bottom: 120px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1482825422816{margin-bottom: 110px !important;}"]
To top divider
This is example of to top icon. Normally it is already included in ConsultingPress. You can see it when scrolling down. It appears on the right bottom side of the page. However you may need this element on specific position or specific page, so we decided to include it.[/vc_column_text][volcanno_divider divider_style="divider-scroll-up"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

After working in large IT Security agency for five years, Joshua recognized the need for IT Security consultants and decided to grow his experience in that direction.
He provides guidance in vulnerability and threat management, security architecture and implementation, security risk and compliance, security incident management and security education and awareness training.
Joshua has major experience in vulnerability and threat management, field he's been working in for ten years now, helping companies worldwide in dealing with addressing ever rising IT security threats She provides guidance in vulnerability and threat management, security architecture and implementation, security risk and compliance, security incident management and security education and awareness training.

item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="What Our Clients Say About Us" title_size="h3"][vc_column_text]We pay attention to details and quality, good communication and strong customer relationship. Here is what they say about us.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1482309791475{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column][volcanno_testimonial style="testimonial-style-02" text="``I always love when you upload something new. Your attention to detail, uniqueness and story driven design is a joy to explore. Every pixel is there for a reason, nothing is generic, and it all works great together. Truly an inspiration to look p to, and steal from :)``" author="ColorByt" href="url:google.com|||" href_text="Web Designer"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1482309821499{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column][volcanno_testimonial style="testimonial-style-02" text="``Really happy with the guidance you provided. Our employees are now more aware of their role in information security and management of IT is much efficient now.``" author="Vladimir Mrkela" href="url:http%3A%2F%2Fgoogle.com|||" href_text="PIXEL INDUSTRY Ltd."][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1482309829352{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column][volcanno_testimonial style="testimonial-style-02" text="``Just wanted to thank Consulting Press for providing exceptional Tourism consulting service to our company. Investing in sustainable tourism proves to be really well decision.``" author="Scott Rogers" href="url:http%3A%2F%2Fgoogle.com|||" href_text="Poleo Digital"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1482309836873{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column][volcanno_testimonial style="testimonial-style-02" text="``I dont purchase themes lightly...this theme is awesome! Lots of nice features. The content manager is very good, it takes a small while just to get used to the format but overall its really good. The support is great and with a fast response, with helpful answers and solutions to my personal preferences. Just buy it, you wont regret it :)``" author="sboyle" href="url:http%3A%2F%2Fgoogle.com|||" href_text="Elvyre Retina Ready WordPress Theme"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_testimonial style="testimonial-style-02" text="``... The end product is one of the most solid web experiences we have seen on ThemeForest though we are still doing more testing. The functionality, user interface, and customization of features is extremely high end. We keep telling our client that Elvyre is what a $20,000 website looks like everyone is very psyched about it.....``" author="- DigitalMarketingAssociates" href="url:http%3A%2F%2Fgoogle.com|||" href_text="Elvyre Retina Ready WordPress Theme"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

Linked Supply Chain

Linked Supply Chain is logistics and transportation consulting company in Germany. They have been our partners for seven years. Their expertise in logistics and transportation and our expertise in management consulting results in complete solution for every company that needs logistics and transportation consulting services. For more information visit linkedsupplychain.com[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1482310571658{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3"][volcanno_single_image image="625"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_column_text]

SecureCam

SecureCam is small IT Security company based in New York, USA. They have wide experience in IT Security development and management. SecureCam has been our partner for 5 years providing exceptional IT Security Consulting services for our clients. For more information visit securecam.com[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1482310565212{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3"][volcanno_single_image image="621"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_column_text]

Travel Deals

For more information visit traveldeals.com[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1482310620101{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3"][volcanno_single_image image="623"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_column_text]

Travel Portugal

For more information visit travelportugal.com[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_feature_box style="boxed-background" icon_type="icon_lynny" icon_lynny="lynny-pages-1" title="Want to partner up with us?" text="Become one of our partners and help us share the vision of successful finance consulting and it's value for companies around the world." href="url:http%3A%2F%2Fdemo.pixel-industry.com%2Fconsultingpress%2Fcontact-compact%2F|||" read_more="Contact us"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Pricing
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-02" title="Management consulting services" subtitle="PRICING"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1482311556297{margin-bottom: 120px !important;}"]

It's well known that most consulting companies do not charge fixed fees. The pricing is based on project basis. However, there could be a need for featuring some kind of prices, like paid seminars or case studies, so we decided to include this element in ConsultingPress.

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][volcanno_pricing_table title="Basic" price=" {$4000} / project" features_group="%5B%7B%22text%22%3A%22Basic%20IT%20Security%20management%20consulting%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22text%22%3A%22Basic%20consulting%20about%20IT%20Security%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22text%22%3A%22Cca%205%20days%20project%20duration%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22text%22%3A%22For%20small%20business%20owners%5Cn%22%7D%5D" button_href="url:http%3A%2F%2Fdemo.pixel-industry.com%2Fconsultingpress%2Fcontact-compact%2F|||"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][volcanno_pricing_table table_style="active" title="Standard" price="{$8000} / project" features_group="%5B%7B%22text%22%3A%22Business%20IT%20Security%20consulting%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22text%22%3A%22Security%20Architecture%20%26%20Implementation%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22text%22%3A%22Cca%2012%20days%20project%20duration%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22text%22%3A%22For%20medium%20business%20owners%5Cn%22%7D%5D" button_href="url:http%3A%2F%2Fdemo.pixel-industry.com%2Fconsultingpress%2Fcontact-compact%2F|||"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][volcanno_pricing_table title="Professional" price="{$12000} / project" features_group="%5B%7B%22text%22%3A%22Complete%20It%20Security%20consulting%22%7D%2C%7B%22text%22%3A%22Vulnerability%20%26%20Threat%20Management%2C%20IT%20Security%20Architecture%20and%20Implementation%2C%20...%22%7D%2C%7B%22text%22%3A%22Cca%2030%20days%20project%20duration%22%7D%2C%7B%22text%22%3A%22For%20large%20business%20owners%22%7D%5D" button_href="url:http%3A%2F%2Fdemo.pixel-industry.com%2Fconsultingpress%2Fcontact-compact%2F|||"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]

Prior to becoming a principal in ConsultingPress, Patrick worked in Avia IT Security Ltd governing risk management department. Patrick joined ConsultingPress in 2004.
He provides guidance in vulnerability and threat management, security architecture and implementation, security risk and compliance, security incident management and security education and awareness training.
Patrick has major experience in vulnerability and threat management, field he's been working in for ten years now, helping companies worldwide in dealing with addressing ever rising IT security threats and finding best ways to reduce it's impact.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Education &
